titleStmt.title: Recto: Report from praktores sitikon; Verso: Note on contents

msContents.summary: Recto: Report from praktores sitikon to the person in charge of lodging and distribution of corn; Verso: Table of contents

msItem.note: Recto. 11 lines with the fibres; Verso: 2 lines against the fibres
Former shelfmark or inv. no.: A I 66 b (in pencil on old glass frame)

origin.origPlace: ?: Herakleopolis, Herakleopolite nome, province of Egypt

provenance.p: Purchased in Berlin by Lund University Library in 1933, from prof. Carl Schmidt; Isabella Andorlini "Scavi e acquisti di papiri negli anni '30: il caso dei PLund" in Comunicazioni, Firenze 1995, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, p. 45-50

div.ab: Recto: To Aurelius, Horion's son, former high priest and commissioner of food-supply, councillor of the ancient highly favoured town Herakleopolis, appointed for the lodging and distribution of grain in the district of Herakleopolis and the district in the neighbourhood of Pheibichis from Aurelius Thaius, son of Staphanougis, and Aurelius Phousis, son of Pechysis, the two praktores sitikon...

listBibl.bibl: P. Lund. VI 9 SB VI 9358 2 BL III 105 (line 1); BL VI 74 (line 3); TM 31254; Bingen, J., Chronique d'â€“gypte 29, 1954, p. 153
